entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture no longer returns the correct result #77697
  • Add the ability for a native host to load an assembly and specify the load context #77696
    8.0.0
  • Use new .NET logo in NuGet packages. #77695
  • Consolidate Microsoft.DotNet.Cecil* libraries into one nuget package #77692
  • KB5011048 breaks PowerShell in Windows Sandboxes #77681
  • [API Proposal]: string.GetHashCodeNonRandomized #77679
    8.0.0
  • Configuration binding with nested types and readonly properties not working #77677
    8.0.0
  • [libraries-jitstress x86] FileSystemWatcher_InternalBufferSize_SynchronizingObject fails with "Did not observe an error event within 500ms and 3 attempts." #77676
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json is adding EqualityContract properties metadata for records #77675
  • Use "DOTNET_EnableCrashReport" create report, but "*.crashreport.json" file was not found #77671
    8.0.0
  • ToUpper not working as intended with Turkish Culture #77689
  • [API Proposal]: System.Threading.RateLimiting RateLimitLease should implement IAsyncDisposable #77669
  • A better way to manage cookies and session for HttpClient #77668
  • Live apphost not being used by crossgen2 with source build #77667
    Future
  • Add JsonElement.ValueSpan #77666
  • Tracking issue for some thread pool experiments (.NET 8) #77665
    8.0.0
  • Crossbuilding armv6 fails on Alpine Linux #77663
  • Test failure R2R-CG2 windows arm64 Checked @ Windows.10.Arm64v8.Open JIT\\jit64\\mcc\\interop\\mcc_i17\\mcc_i17.cmd #77662
  • Test failure JIT/Directed/nullabletypes/Desktop/boxunboxvaluetype_ro/boxunboxvaluetype_ro.sh #77661

Closed

  • [pgo] Assertion failed '((-slop) <= diff) && (diff <= slop)' during 'Compute edge weights (2, false)' #77450
    8.0.0
  • Address non-standard printf formatting in printf #8737
    8.0.0
  • The Jit does not add explicit null checks for zero-offset field addresses #77640
    8.0.0
  • ComInterfaceGenerator.Unit.Tests.WorkItemExecution failing with Internal CLR error on Win x86 #77087
  • Could emit branchless form of i >= 0 && j >= 0 for signed integers #61940
    Future
  • System.Drawing.Common library should conform to interop guidelines #51565
    Future
  • [.NET 8] Mono workload doesn't import Microsoft.NET.Runtime.MonoAOTCompiler.Task #77385
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests source generator tests crash in DeflateInit2_ #77090
    8.0.0
  • Race condition on marshal-ilgen init #74603
    8.0.0
  • Hang with WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext #77673
  • `Directory.GetFileSystemEntries` returns nonexistent paths when given a volume only #77657
  • [QUIC] QUIC how to use port reuse，and QuicListener send unconnected message #77664
  • Cleanup handling of SIMD instructions in the emitter #9641
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove `MetaDataTracker` #77701
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fixing VarLocInfo on JITDUMP #77700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF][Release/7.0] Update release/7.0 Perf infrastructure to use Perf repo release/7.0 branch #77699
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • First pass at adding a test to reproduce the problem. #77693
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Improve WoA workflow documentation #77691
    area-Meta
  • Number block assignments normally #77690
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove `fgMorphBlockOperand<struct>` #77688
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update SuperPMI artifact logging #77685
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Don't generate extra structure record in debugging information for enums #77684
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add ability for crossgen2 to synthesize PGO histograms #77683
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Correct minimum memory size value from 200MB to 20MB #77682
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Update a few dependencies #77678
    area-Infrastructure
  • Move `LibraryImport`s of `System.Data.OleDb` to `Common\src\Interop` #77674
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Add readme for System.Linq #77672
    area-System.Linq, 8.0.0
  • Added ConnectionString Support for Extra Azure Service Connection Types #77670
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution

Merged

  • Exclude param/return/exception tags from summary block #77686
    community-contribution
  • Avoid duplicated read #77577
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix non-standard modifiers of printf in GC #77627
    area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Add LLVM documentation. #77445
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add explicit null checks for zero-offset struct fields #77641
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix link in System.Collections.Immutable readme #77687
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Never send messages from our internal protocol extensions to the browser #77616
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Move Interop code from System.Drawings.Common to Common directory #77565
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • [Workloads] Add UsingMobileWorkload property to control loading net7 packs #77489
    area-Build-mono
  • [MONO][MARSHAL] Initialize ilgen with a flag #77448
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix inconsistency in Regex infinite timeout usages #77560
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fold full-width SIMD-typed indirections #76745
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by non-numbers #76065
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • [build] Enable CodeQL with TSA #76751
    area-Infrastructure
  • Delete some unused files and functions from clr pal #77112
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • [wasm] browser profiler #77449
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Switch CoreCLR WeakReference to unified managed implementation #77196
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Do not set flags for JTRUE op1 #76731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE] Testing `Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion` #77576
    test-failure, NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Emit less jump-stubs on x64 #77639
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement Console.SetWindowSize() for linux #75824
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Use DOTNET_EnableCrashReport to create dumps #77578
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Linker into runtime diff #77569
    NO-MERGE, area-Tools-linker
  • JIT: introduce some SSA accounting and checking #77055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Use generated runtime.json when building shared framework packages (backport of #76068) #77510
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [JIT] X64 - More replacement sequences for integer multiplication by a constant #77137
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change regMask_enum and regMaskTP to unsigned __int64_t on AMD64. #77571
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Introduce `FIELD_ADDR` and use it for TLS statics and instance class fields #77353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Extend ProcessStartInfo to allow setting LOGON_NETCREDENTIALS_ONLY #77637
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Fix Wasm.Build.Tests with stable 7.0.0 #76939
    test-failure, NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, blocking, 7.0.x
  • Update branding to 7.0.1 #77549
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocked, 7.0.x
  • Forbid creation of non-faulting null-check nodes. #77078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Make Type.IsEnum and Type.GetEnumUnderlyingType intrinsics #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [wasm][debugger] Fixing when trying to call mono functions in a non wasm page #77501
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Fold bound checks for static readonly arrays/strings #77593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] x86/x64 - improved localloc codegen in some cases #76851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Mark and expose additional Vector functions as Intrinsic #77562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Avoid reporting empty debug info ranges to the vm #77289
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] TAR: Trim file type bits from mode header #77612
    area-System.IO, 7.0.x
  • [wasm][debugger] Trying to fix firefox flaky tests on CI. #75090
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Migrate docker containers to latest tags #76630
  • Split and simplify `fgMorphOneAsgBlockOp` #76793
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete a bit of dead code #77655
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [hot_reload] implement param reflection #77563
    area-EnC-mono
  • Vectorize (Last)IndexOfAny(Except) for ASCII needles #76740
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Remove Vector128 checks for amd64 APIs #77534
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add option for truncated stream detection #75671
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [wasm] WasmAppHost docs #77265
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Add `IMemoryView` as exported type #77397
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • [wasm] jest + optimize ManagedError #77547
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Add doc describing well-known properties that the host can pass to the runtime #76732
    area-Host
  • add 0x63 status code #74780
    blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • Remove `palrt` from JIT and remove `memcpy` from PAL #77556
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • 73150 enable CborDocument_Roundtrip test #76378
    area-System.Formats.Cbor
  • Equalize committed space in free regions and move regions to global free list #77597
    area-GC-coreclr
  • #76881 internal properties in GetRuntimeProperties are not shown #77169
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-31
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • New helper for green thread stack segments #2056
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Turn on optimisation in RyuJit module, partial support for FIELD_LIST and lowering promoted fields #2007

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Why aren't operators overloaded for Vector and Matrix? #28826

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28828

Merged

  • RuntimeIdentifiers Code Coverage + Implicit RuntimeIdentifiers (not just runtimeIdentifier) #28484

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28667

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add `=` for property completions inside initializers #65130
  • I received this error just starting Visual Studio 2022 Pro. #65123
  • Trigger and report the VS insertion URL back to the PR upon PR creation (Productivity team only) #65121
    17.5 P3
  • Inconsistent capitalisation in quick fix title: Fix Name Violation #65115
  • Remove Unnecessary Usings is modifying white space before first type declaration #65114

Closed

  • provide a way to sync solution from OOP side #37424
    Backlog
  • Can't f5 roslyn. #37420
  • Can't view all fields in constructor #37406
    Backlog
  • Workspace should clear open documents that are removed during OnProjectReloaded #35963
    Backlog
  • MinimalTestExportProvider.GetEditorAssemblyCatalog returns an internal service TestExperimentationServiceInternal #30249
    Backlog
  • Editor Completion: We have to implement IExperimentationServiceInternal #27428
    Backlog
  • Temp allocations in SympolDisplay.ToDisplayString #37345
    Backlog
  • Incorrect ref escape analysis #64045
    17.5
  • Go to implementation should have some tests for mismatched nullable annotations #37251
    Backlog
  • Testing results progress flashes continuously while running tests in an extremely distracting manner. #37195
  • Files with errors should have a red underline in Solution Explorer #37191
    Backlog
  • Class view / object browser doesn't show ? for nullable annotated types #37185
    Backlog
  • Add tests for find references that it ignores nullability when searching for usages of types #37174
    Backlog
  • Static class icon different from normal class in intellisense #37132
    Backlog
  • C# Interface Icon #37127
    Backlog
  • ETL files captured by the feedback tool should report Find Usages operations #36991
    Backlog
  • discuss on JTF usage in Roslyn #36937
    Backlog
  • Keyboard Setup Confusing #36918
    Backlog
  • Generate IL at compile time for System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex(constantString, RegexOptions.Compile) #36885
    Backlog
  • Reintroduce sequence diagrams generation from c# code #36871
    Backlog
  • crash on VB signature help #36858
    Compiler.Next
  • cannot build latest master #36840
  • Please make C# editor capable of pinning section headers #36819
    Backlog
  • "Inline temporary variable" breaks code for 'out' parameter #36788

  • Go to definition from implementation #36783
    Backlog
  • Auto readonly modifier deletes comments #36759
    Backlog
  • Requesting "Close All Regions" in document ability #36739
    Backlog

    Backlog
  • Expose IHierarchyItemToProjectIdMap functionality publicly (feature request) #36710
    Backlog
  • VS 15.9.8 Unknown Hard Error ArgumentOutOfRangeException #36672

    Backlog

    Backlog
  • Can't run tests in VS anymore. #36244
    Backlog
  • Remove unused parameter does not do anything when clicked #36153

  • New test methods are not run until i restart VS #36123

  • Diff view can't understand preview language features #35937
    Backlog
  • Remove obsolete editor-layer IIndentationService #35872
    Backlog
  • PROTOTYPE comment in ProjectState.cs #35855
    Backlog
  • Can't build latest roslyn #35849
  • The color of VS2019 is so light, can I use VS2017 style in VS2019? #35799
  • "Make async void return Task" fix returns code with odd formatting #35794
    Backlog
  • Document Outline is empty #35708
    Backlog
  • make service hub log to include method that throw exception #35654
    Backlog
  • `for (;;)` should not be reformatted as `for (; ; )` #35444
    Backlog

    Backlog
  • NFW on document navigation service - top 3 on 15.9 #35353
    Backlog
  • Constructor for VisualStudioWorkspaceDiagnosticAnalyzerProviderService should not have thread affinity #35137
    Backlog
  • Migrate Xamarin IVTs to the External Access pattern #35099
  • Migrate CodeLens IVTs to the External Access pattern #35086
  • Migrate ExternalDependencyServices to the External Access pattern #35085
  • Migrate IntelliTrace IVTs to the External Access pattern #35084

    Backlog

    Backlog
  • Absent Public API #32834
  • make Sqlite to handle error better #32819
    Backlog
  • Be able to write notes/comments in the code without requiring rebuild #32639
    Backlog
  • Integration test failure in CSharpNavigationBar.VerifyNavBar #32437

  • Read/Write Kind in FAR Appears Offscreen #32405
    Backlog
  • CSharpAddMissingReferenceCodeFixProvider encountered an error and has been disabled #32231
    Backlog
  • Bring over CancellationTokenSequence #32131
    Backlog
  • "Rename" refactoring should consistently be the first item in IDE ctrl+dot box #32058
    Backlog
  • Inline temporary variable codefix removes indentation when VS does not know how to indent the target line #32024
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix implement-interface collisions with ref-returning indexers #65132
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - Adds tooltip descriptions to snippets #65131
    Area-IDE
  • Better name suggestions when creating new out-variables #65129
    Area-IDE
  • Don't offer 'introduce variable' on 'this' expression #65128
    Area-IDE
  • Move net60 ref assemblies to compiler only #65125
    Area-Compilers
  • Add back designer attribute scanning #65118
    Area-IDE
  • Harden FileLogger against all kind of exceptions during File IO #65117
    Area-IDE
  • Remove the static ConditionalWeakTable for per-project CompilationWit… #65116
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Check escape after converting #64976
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Removing interface that appears to be unused #65127
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Additional ref fields tests #65107
    Area-Compilers, Test, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Extend pattern explainer for more complicated graphs #65002
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add A/B flag to test removing recoverable assembly-metadata in VS. #64948

    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Move some external access types to the UnitTesting.API namespace #65126
    Area-Analyzers
  • Make ITextBufferCloneService no longer a workspace service #65119
    Area-IDE
  • Fix issue with 'use pattern matching' #65120
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move net50 ref assemblies to only projects that need them #65093
    Area-Compilers
  • Update config for 17.5 P1 #65122
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Skip `FunctionTypeSymbol`'s in `BoundNode.Dump()` #65082
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update code to use range operator #65104
    Area-IDE, Next

  • Provide RIVT for unit test assembly #65111

Updated

  • Consistently extract synthesized delegate info from method symbol #64966

  • Fix a race between AsyncQueue operations #65078
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve parser error recovery around misplaced semicolon #65089
    Area-Compilers
  • Reduce amount of allocated MissingMetadataTypeSymbol symbols during various lookup operations. #65046
    Area-Compilers
  • Report obsolete diagnostics for types named var/unmanaged/notnull #64717
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Enhance rule metadata and suppression info in SARIF V2 errorlog #64277
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Fix ArgumentNullException under a race condition in analyzer driver #65083
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Display lambda default parameter values in QuickInfo #65045
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support inferring rate-limited endpoints in OpenAPI #44810
  • Support disabling auto-injection of browser refresh JavaScript via launch profile property #44805
    .NET 8 Planning
  • AspNetCore Multi-Tenant Jwt Bearer Token Configuration #44804
  • [Tracking] JWT requirements #44803
    .NET 8 Planning
  • dynamic endpoint in controller #44790
  • Support object content along with custom status code in Results API #44789

Closed

  • Blazor server doesn't render pages properly with custom WebApplicationOptions #44439
    .NET 8 Planning
  • NavigationLock throws uncaught JSDisconnectedException on Blazor Server #44795
    7.0.x
  • Compression error in br encoding depending on razor cshtml format #44667
  • Microsoft Dev Box integration with dotnet/aspnetcore #42004
    8.0-MQ
  • Binding to input datetime-local deletes day when entering 0 first #44796
  • Perf improvement: single_query #44571
  • Blazor JSDisconnectedException caught as AggregateException from TaskScheduler.UnobservedTaskException #44684

PullRequests

Created

  • !fixup! Correct CodeQL3000 setup #44809
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove DOTNET_CLI_DO_NOT_USE_MSBUILD_SERVER workaround #44808
    area-infrastructure
  • Backport 'Fix NavigationLock throwing a JSDisconnectedException on browser close in Blazor Server' #44806
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 7.0.x
  • [Templates] Fix links to http://useiconic.com #44801
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc
  • Enable CA1854 #44799
    community-contribution
  • Update for more accessible colors in dev exception page #44798
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Issues

Created

    Backlog
  • Flyout menu vanished #11011
    Backlog
  • AngularJS is not rendering in WebView on Android #11007
    Backlog
  • App.Current.RequestedThemeChanged never fires #11005
    Backlog
  • Android WebViewClient's ShouldInterceptRequest is never called in MAUI WebView #11004
    Backlog
  • The bottom tab bar is invisible after setting Shell.CurrentItem #11003
    Backlog

Closed

  • Changing the root page when navigating crashes the application on Android #10824
    7.0
  • Different behavior HorizontalStackLayout #10848
    Backlog
  • Error ADB0010: Mono.AndroidTools.InstallFailedException: Failure [INSTALL_FAILED_USER_RESTRICTED: Install canceled by user] #10829
    Backlog
  • Clicking with a mouse will make it impossible to change focus by code #10992
  • Shell TabBar displays huge images (ios/macos) #10993
  • XAML Hot Reload fails with TypeConverter for RowDefinitionCollection error #10679
    7.0
  • .NET 7 support in MAUI #9192
    7.0
  • Text alignment not respected in migrated project #10728

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow Button.ImageSource to be updated on Android, iOS and macOS #11008

Merged

  • Update PR template #11012

Updated

    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 Planning
  • [iOS] RadioButton a11y #10832

  • Fix shadow visibility on Windows #10996

  • _itemsSource may be null in CarouselViewLoopManager #11000

Created
